attributes.action: Work towards everyone having an education and to improve the education system.
attributes.additional_details: Without an education it can not only affect that person but their whole family, people should not be discriminated from their own human right. With some money saved up we should be able to get people the education they need, we are more fortunate than others and have a lot more than other people do, therefore we should help people with their own right which they are less fortunate for.
attributes.background: I want the government to do this because it is unfair on some people not having an education as it can affect their future without it. They will be unable to develop basic skills. Without an education people will be unable to access jobs in the future. Everyone has the right to an education.

rejection.details: If you want the UK Government to support equal access to education for children around the world, we could accept a petition on that.
